alert.note: Alert for Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 16 at 3:29AM MDT until June 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: .Record flood waters over the upper Yellowstone River will make their way downstream into Prairie County through Saturday. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flood waters from the upper Yellowstone River will make their way downstream. Minor flooding is possible along the Yellowstone River in Prairie County. * WHERE...Prairie County Montana. * WHEN...From this evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Low lying areas along the Yellowstone River in Prairie County may be impacted with flood waters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rising river levels will possibly flood low-lying areas in Prairie County. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
